incidents.name: Dropbox may not be working as expected

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Team admins are unable to access the product if they have not completed the setup quiz. They may experience redirects back to the quiz. We are working to fix the problem as quickly as we can. The available workaround is to use mobile web, the mobile app, or desktop app. Thank you for your patience.
